name: Parodius Portable
summary: This is a compilation of all the classic shooting games in the Parodius franchise and was released only in Japan. It includes an enhanced remake of the original Parodius for the MSX, as well as the PSX version of Jikkyou Oshaberi Parodius and the arcade ports of Parodius Da!, Jikkyou Oshaberi Parodius ~ Forever With Me ~ and Sexy Parodius.
